story:
Today I went to my favorite Taco Stand called the {adjective} {animal}.
Unlike most food stands, they cook and prepare the food in a {vehicle} while you {verb}.
The best thing on the menu is the {color} {noun}.
Instead of ground beef they fill the taco with {foods1}, cheese, and top it off with a salsa made from {foods2}.
If that doesn't make your mouth water, then it's just like {person} always says: {saying}!

Today a {occupation} came to our school to talk to us about her job. She said the most important skill you need to know to do her job is to be able to {verb1} around a {noun1}.
She said it was easy for her to learn her job because she loved to {verb2} when she was my age -- and that helps a lot!
If you're considering her profession, I hope you can be {adjective1} near a {noun2}.
That's very important! If you get too distracted in that situation you won't be able to {verb3} next to a {noun3}!

“{animals1}, ” the photographer said as the camera flashed! {person1} and I had gone to {place1} to get our photos taken today.
The first photo we really wanted was a picture of us dressed as {things1} pretending to be a {profession}.
When we saw the proofs of it, I was a bit {feeling} because it looked different than in my head. (I hadn't imagined so many {things2} behind us.)
However, the second photo was exactly what I wanted. We both looked like wearing {pieceOfClothing} and {things3} -- exactly what I had in mind!

I just got back from a pizza party with {things1}. Can you believe we got to eat pizza in {place1}?! Everyone got to choose their own toppings.
I made '{food1} and {food2}' pizza, which is my favorite! They even stuffed the crust with {food3}.
How {adjective1}! If that wasn't good enough already, was there singing {songTitle}.
I was so inspired by the music, I had to get up out of my seat and {verb1}.

There once was a gingerbread man who had two {adjective1} for eyes and a {color1} for a nose.
He always said, ' {saying1} as fast as you can, you can't catch me I'm the gingerbread man.'
One day he ran past a {profession} , but they couldn't catch him. He kept running until he passed a {thing1}, but they couldn't catch him either.
Suddenly, he came across a river near {place1}. How would he cross? Then he saw a {thing2} floating by. He jumped on it, but it was actually {celebrity} -- who just so happened to love cookies :)

Hi my name is {name1}, but my friends call me {name2}.
My favorite color is the color of {foodOrSillyWord} and my favorite thing to do is {verb1}.
My parents were a {profession1} and {profession2}, which is why we lived in {place1}.
You probably know me from my TV commercial for {celebrity}.
I'm the one who says, '{phraseLyricsSaying}' at the very end!

Today I met the Queen of {place1} during a quick trip to {place2}.
I had left the house because I really needed to pick up a dozen {thing1} in order to repair my {noun1}.
I wasn't planning on meeting her or I probably wouldn't have worn my {clothing}.
I know most people would have bowed, but I forgot and decided to instead.
She smiled politely and then said, '{phraseLyricsSaying}'.

Last night I dreamed I was a butterfly with {things1} that looked like {color1}.
I flew to {place1} with my best friend, {person1}, who was a {insect}.
